text: Riccardo Filippelli (born 4 July 1980) is an Italian sport shooter, who participated at the 2018 ISSF World Shooting Championships, winning a medal. ==Achievements== {| class="wikitable" width=40% style="font-size:100%; text- align:left;" |- !Medal !!Competition !!Event |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:Living people Category:1980 births Category:Italian male sport shooters Category:Skeet shooters Category:European Games competitors for Italy Category:Shooters at the 2019 European Games Category:European Games medalists in shooting Category:European Games silver medalists for Italy Category:Shooters of Centro Sportivo Carabinieri Category:Shooters of Gruppo Sportivo Esercito
title: Riccardo Filippelli
